artist: Pete “Yes the Urza's Legacy One” Venters
flavorText: Synonyms for "erase" we haven't used: ablate, a̶b̶r̶a̶d̶e̶, chafe, fray, f̶r̶a̶z̶z̶l̶e̶, scuff, and scrub.
name: Erase (Not the Urza's Legacy One)
originalText:
If you control two or more white permanents that share an artist, you may play Erase (Not the Urza's Legacy One) without paying its mana cost.
Remove target enchantment from the game.

rulings.text: This card recieved errata for its flavor text on Gatherer: http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=74275

text:
If you control two or more white permanents that share an artist, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost.
Exile target enchantment.
